newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Cheung Kong lists H1 completed projects. [CORRECTED 11:04 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Cheung Kong lists H1 completed projects. [CORRECTED 11:04 GMT]

text.p: Hong Kong property giant Cheung Kong (Holdings) Ltd said on Thursday the following
developments were completed in the first half of 1996 -
Lynwood Court Yuen Long 178,300 sq m 48.25 pct
The following are scheduled for completion in the second half of the year - (Corrects to make clear the projects listed below have still to be completed).
Wayland House Shek Pai Wan 6,000 sq m 50 pct
Modern Warehouse Kwun Tong 22,296 sq m 100 pct
